title: Where in the Netherlands is Partij Voor de Dieren the most popular? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to the results of last year’s elections for the Eerste Kamer (upper house of parliament in the Netherlands), it’s Amsterdam, where the PvdD got 8.7% of total votes. Not suprisingly, the other municipalties where over 5% of the populace voted for the party were cities, often those with universities (Leiden, Nijmegen, Wageningen, Utrecht, etc.). One could perhaps conclude from the results that the PvdD is most popular among a middle-class, educated set. If you want to see the percentage of PvdD votes per municipality, it’s linked here: Verkiezingen
